amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Istook amendment, to prohibit the expenditure of any funds in the bill for family planning services clinics, unless the clinic certifies that it has a policy of encouraging family participation in the decision of the minor to seek its services.

action.text: Substitute (A031) offered by Mr. Obey to the Istook amendment (A030).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 193 (Roll no. 310).
